iss.description: The Issuer of the Verifiable Credential; it MUST be set to the URI of the Credential Endpoint of the PID/EAA Provider

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the Verifiable Credential was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

exp.description: The UNIX Timestamp after which the Verifiable Credential is no longer valid

nbf.description: The UNIX Timestamp before which the Verifiable Credential must not be accepted for validation

cnf.description: Contains the proof of possession key as defined in

jwk.description: It MUST be set to the same value of the 'c_nonce' parameter in the Token Request provided by the Token Endpoint of the PID/EAA Issuer
